oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Flooding at 8th Avenue North and Crawford Street, 1956
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of flooding at 8th Avenue North and Crawford Street in February of 1956, Capitol Hill visible in the background. Photographed by John Acuff of the Nashville Housing Authority, 19 February 1956. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
